ing: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped
1/4 cup ice cubes, or as desired
n: Beet, Carrot, Almond, Ginger, and Spirulina Smoothie
des: "If you have a hard time finding ways to eat the daily recommended amount of vegetables look no further. Beets are fantastic. Carrots are fantastic. So why not add the two in one amazing smoothie? Add some almonds, ginger, and spirulina for good measure and you have a smoothie and meal all-in-one."
ins: Blend beet, carrots, and ginger together in a blender until smooth. Add water if mixture is too thick. Add almonds to beet mixture and blend until smooth. Add spirulina and ice and blend until smooth.
